shinycoreci 0.0.0.9005
  • Reference

Generate a repository event.

trigger.Rd

This function uses the GitHub API to create a repository dispatch event that can trigger workflows. Currently, the testthat.yml workflow registers itself for the shinytest-apps event, and so can be initiated by running this function with an event_type of "shinytest-apps".

trigger(
  event_type,
  repo = "rstudio/shinycoreci-apps",
  client_payload = list(),
  auth_token = Sys.getenv("GITHUB_PAT")
)

trigger_deploy(
  repo = "rstudio/shinycoreci-apps",
  auth_token = Sys.getenv("GITHUB_PAT")
)

trigger_docker(
  repo = "rstudio/shinycoreci-apps",
  auth_token = Sys.getenv("GITHUB_PAT")
)

Arguments

event_type

The name of the event to create on the repository
repo

The GitHub repo to create the event on; defaults to rstudio/shinycoreci-apps
client_payload

The JSON object to make available in the workflow as the github.event.client_payload object
auth_token

Your GitHub OAuth2 token; defaults to Sys.getenv("GITHUB_PAT")
